welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Denton, a charming city rich in history and known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

restaurants.name: Lily's Vegetarian Indian Cuisine

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily used for low-cost and charter airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly used for domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but it may require a new login every 4 hours.
